name: RealFlight 8
description: RealFlight 8 is a flight simulator for model airplanes, helicopters, and drones. Fly more than 140 vehicles at 50+ flying sites in a huge open world. Test your skills in the challenges, and fly with your friends in online multiplayer games.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: Intel® Pentium® 1.0GHz or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Full DirectX 9 compliant DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 10 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Processor or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 3D Accelerated Video with: 512 MB dedicated video memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 10 GB available space
